description:
How to reproduce:

1) create an instance, note the physical host as src_host where the VM is created
2) nova resize servername $flavor
...wait a long time for it to finish
3) nova resize-confirm servername

now login to the source node of the src_host, do virsh list --all
the instance should still be there listed as shutoff, which should in theory no longer exist.
title: resize leave leftover libvirt configs

comments.content:
iptable rules for instance last on the source node, too.
Once the instance is deleted, the rule on source node is not clean, which makes later instance with the same fixed IP might not be reached via floating IP. Because security group rule of the first instance is applied first.
